item.description:
Thanksgiving Weekend is a lot of fun in the Mt. Washington Valley area. The ski season will hopefully be kicking off as we expect the mountains will be open! Get in the first runs of the season!

We'd love for you to join us for the weekend which will include:
Friday and Saturday lodging
Saturday private events for members and house-guests only (more info will be provided upon request)

The cost for the weekend is $40 for guests and $10 for members for lodging (plus any additional cost for optional activities).

Credit card payments are available via Paypal for a slight convenience charge. If you prefer this method, advance payment is required. Please advise so I may send you an invoice.

Optional Valley Activities:
Ski or Ride at one of the local mountains
Hiking
Holiday Shopping at the Outlets
Much Much More!

Looking forward to seeing you all for a spectacular weekend!

Please let me know if you have any questions!

group.name: Innitou Ski Runners & Rider's Activities Club of New England

item.name: Spend Thanksgiving Weekend With the Innitous
